## ðŸ“‚ Project Name:KwizeraCo ltd

## ðŸŽ¯ Objective
KwizeraCo Ltd., a retail company in Rwanda, sells food and beverages across regions of Rwanda.
The company generates thousands of sales transactions monthly, but management struggles to identify top customers by revenue, track sales growth trends, and segment customers effectively. Without insights, marketing campaigns and inventory planning remain inefficient.
Expected Outcome
  â€¢	Identify top-performing customers and products.
  â€¢ Track running totals and trends.
  â€¢	Analyze month-over-month growth.
  â€¢	Segment customers into quartiles.
  â€¢	Provide actionable insights for business strategy.


## ðŸ§± Schema Design
- `customers` â€“ Details of each customer including customer name  and region.
- `products` â€“   including product name  and region.
- `transactions` â€“ includes transactions.

  ![CREATING TABLES](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/124999593/494910665-dd64b7bc-b141-40bf-a972-8c489a0c0b07.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTkwOTE1NzMsIm5iZiI6MTc1OTA5MTI3MywicGF0aCI6Ii8xMjQ5OTk1OTMvNDk0OTEwNjY1LWRkNjRiN2JjLWIxNDEtNDBiZi1hOTcyLThjNDg5YTBjMGIwNy5wbmc_.SHA9Wa3PQ-cPVE73iWhoaMFDLTAw1gObRuWs9POJqMM)
## Window Function Implementations
  
 ##Ranking Functions â€“ Top  Customers by Revenue
 ![rank](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/124999593/494910801-de717769-5503-4ae5-8a7b-082229cc5468.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTkwOTE1NzMsIm5iZiI6MTc1OTA5MTI3MywicGF0aCI6Ii8xMjQ5OTk1OTMvNDk0OTEwODAxLWRlNzE3NzY5LTU1MDMtNGFlNS04YTdiLTA4MjIyOWNjNTQ2OC5wbmc_.EDtNqv7HBk6-OGq7yrfYggPKL1dTpKClbX4ta046BXk)
 ![rank](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/124999593/494910736-8bfaa10b-7839-4914-9cd9-d28963082590.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTkwOTE1NzMsIm5iZiI6MTc1OTA5MTI3MywicGF0aCI6Ii8xMjQ5OTk1OTMvNDk0OTEwNzM2LThiZmFhMTBiLTc4MzktNDkxNC05Y2Q5LWQyODk2MzA4MjU5MC5wbmc_.NLit7bxBmgPO7-ueBwyBgPqW8vsmlcJ--GHWW3Mu1KA)
 
 
  Interpretation: Ranking functions help identify top customers, while handling ties differently.
  ________________________________________
  
 ## Aggregate Functions â€“ Running Totals & Trends

Interpretation: Aggregates show cumulative totals and trends over time.

## Navigation Functions â€“ Period-to-Period Analysis
![navigation](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/124999593/494910694-8724a5fc-3604-4744-a726-82ddda132555.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTkwOTE1NzMsIm5iZiI6MTc1OTA5MTI3MywicGF0aCI6Ii8xMjQ5OTk1OTMvNDk0OTEwNjk0LTg3MjRhNWZjLTM2MDQtNDc0NC1hNzI2LTgyZGRkYTEzMjU1NS5wbmc_.7-QZh5NzwCNZyTLGu4d50ziSWDdGIwfRswULvZXTfyI)

## Distribution Functions â€“ Customer Segmentation
![distribution](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/124999593/494910785-c472c0d9-b098-48ca-b389-eb76d8afe4cd.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTkwOTE1NzMsIm5iZiI6MTc1OTA5MTI3MywicGF0aCI6Ii8xMjQ5OTk1OTMvNDk0OTEwNzg1LWM0NzJjMGQ5LWIwOTgtNDhjYS1iMzg5LWViNzZkOGFmZTRjZC5wbmc_.igC7HhtojdkotGFtnmshbNjlPJ7QXKID7Yb68FW0XjA)
 
Interpretation: Distribution functions divide customers into segments, useful for marketing and loyalty programs.
________________________________________
5. Results Analysis
â€¢	Descriptive â€“ What happened?
Kigali recorded the highest sales, with Coffee Beans and Tea dominating.
â€¢	Diagnostic â€“ Why did it happen?
Kigali benefited from higher urban demand and frequent promotions, while Musanze lagged due to limited product range.
â€¢	Prescriptive â€“ What next?
Expand successful products in Kigali, and introduce discounts or promotions in Huye and Musanze to boost performance.
